## Problem 1

Let's load and describe the data!

```{r}
library(p8105.datasets)

```

The "instacart" dataset contains `r nrow(instacart)` rows and `r ncol(instacart)` columns.
Observations are items in orders by user. The dataset includes `r names(instacart)` variables.
